bond.description: Debt securities that pay fixed interest over a specified period
bond.name: Bond Tokens

whichAssetTypeForClass: Which {{assetClass}} asset do you want to design?
assetTypeDifferences: Each asset type has different payment structures, liquidity terms, and investor rights.

cashEquivalent.description: Highly liquid investments that can be readily converted to known amounts of cash.
cashEquivalent.name: Cash Equivalent

fixedIncome.description: Assets that provide returns in the form of regular, fixed interest payments and the return of principal at maturity.
fixedIncome.name: Fixed Income

flexibleIncome.description: Assets that generate variable returns based on market conditions and underlying performance.
flexibleIncome.name: Flexible Income

deposit.description: Time-locked deposits that earn interest over a fixed period
deposit.name: Deposit Tokens

equity.description: Ownership shares representing a claim on assets and earnings
equity.name: Equity Tokens

fund.description: Pooled investment vehicles that aggregate capital from multiple investors
fund.name: Fund Tokens

stablecoin.description: Digital currencies designed to maintain a stable value relative to a reference asset
stablecoin.name: Stablecoins
